description.english: Perform 5 Head Shots in a row with any weapon except the Big One. You know which

description.english: Perform a Head Shot right after a Limb Mutilation when the enemy is flying back in the air

description.tchinese: 在敵人飛回空中時對其斷肢，且立即發動爆頭射擊

description.italian: Accumula più di 300 Gemme Bianche nel tuo inventario

description.schinese: 库存中存放超过300个白宝石
description.tchinese: 儲存300顆以上白色寶石
description.japanese: シロダマを 300 個貯める

description.english: Recover all available Red Gems in the game.
description.german: Finde alle verfügbaren Roten Juwelen im Spiel.
description.french: Récupérez toutes les gemmes rouges du jeu
description.italian: Recupera tutte le Gemme Rosse disponibili nel gioco.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las gemas rojas disponibles en el juego
description.schinese: 恢复游戏中所有可获得的红宝石。
description.tchinese: 找到遊戲中所有可用的紅色寶石。
description.japanese: アップグレードを全て行う
